I like this story for a variety of reasons, the biggest one being, it showcases the hypocrisy of the people on this site. If the Mc drugs the woman (to fuck), nothing to see here. But if he (the Mc) happens to get cucked, then everyone loses their pathetic (beta) minds. Love to see it.
